desc: 测试插入兴趣爱好简单案例
name: InsertHobby

oqls.name: InsertHobby
oqls.oql: insert into Hobby(code, name, descr) values ('DJ', '打架', '喜欢打架')
oqls.sql: insert into HOBBY(CODE, NAME, DESCR) values ('DJ', '打架', '喜欢打架')

oqls.name: InsertHobbyVars
oqls.oql: insert into Hobby(code, name, descr) values (#{code}, #{name}, #{descr})
oqls.sql: insert into HOBBY(CODE, NAME, DESCR) values (#{code}, #{name}, #{descr})
